definitions.definition: A self-propelled railway vehicle for passengers, similar to a bus .

A powered single railway vehicle designed for passenger transport, with a driver's cab in both ends; Not to be confused with motor coach / motorcar , which is a powered railway vehicle capable to haul a train.

main_definition: ( rail transport ) A self-propelled railway vehicle for passengers, similar to a bus .
secondary_definitions: ( rail transport ) A powered single railway vehicle designed for passenger transport, with a driver's cab in both ends; Not to be confused with motor coach / motorcar , which is a powered railway vehicle capable to haul a train.
( Only in Canada and US ) Any unpowered railway vehicle
